definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
able to reply quickly and fluently (idiom); having a ready answer

sentences.english: Little Tom could always answer up to every question.
sentences.chinese: 小汤姆对每个问题往往都能对答如流。

sentences.english: Others can use fluent, playing from the heart envy.
sentences.chinese: 旁人能用英语对答如流，打从心底非常羡慕。

sentences.english: How then comfort ye me in vain, seeing in your answers there remaineth falsehood?
sentences.chinese: 你们对答的话中既都错谬，怎么徒然安慰我呢？

sentences.english: Professor Wang can think on his feet; he always has an answer ready when we ask him questions.
sentences.chinese: 王教授思维敏捷，我们向他提问时，他总能对答如流。
我看著别的地方期待著能对答上的好主意。
教授坐了下来，无以对答。

sentences.english: Sorry, I can not speak Thai. Can you speak English?
sentences.chinese: 他对我讲泰语，如果我也能对答如流多好啊。

sentences.english: The Premier's snip-snap with reporters impressed many people.
sentences.chinese: 总理与记者的机智对答让许多人印象深刻。

sentences.english: I enjoy listening to their witty repartee.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢听他们妙语连珠的对答。

sentences.english: The little boy could always answer up to every question.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩对每个问题往往能对答如流。

sentences.english: Just try to answer quickly, without hesitating.
sentences.chinese: 尽量快速没有迟疑的对答。

sentences.english: And they could not answer him again to these things.
Perhaps he had worked out his strategy beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 也许，他早已在脑海中部署了对答的方案。

sentences.english: The little boy answered up to all the questions except two.
sentences.chinese: 除了两个问题外，这个孩子对答如流。

sentences.english: No matter how the reporters heckled him the speaker always had an answer to come back with.
sentences.chinese: 不论记者如何诘问，发言人总能对答如流。

sentences.english: All the candidates are able to answer the questions without any hitch.
sentences.chinese: 所有报考者都能对答如流。

definition: able to reply quickly and fluently (idiom); having a ready answer
polite phrase/conventional greetings/cliché/to try to worm facts out of sb
to exchange conventional greetings/to exchange pleasantries
(idiom) to sidestep the question/to answer evasively
eloquent and fluent speaker (idiom); grandiloquence/the gift of the gab
variant of 言辭|言辞[yan2 ci2]
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
